title: Vision and Light
excerpt: Rules governing sight and obscured areas.

# Vision and Light

Some adventuring tasks—such as noticing danger, hitting an enemy, and targeting certain spells—are affected by sight, so effects that obscure vision can hinder you, as explained in the **[[vision]]** rules.

### Interaction with Light The environment's illumination level—**[[bright_light|Bright Light]]**, **[[dim_light|Dim Light]]**, or **[[darkness|Darkness]]**—directly impacts a creature's ability to see and can create **[[obscured_areas|Obscured Areas]]**. Special abilities like **[[darkvision]]** or **[[special_senses|Special Senses]]** can mitigate these hindrances.
